recipe.title: Roasted Pineapple with Honey and Pistachios
ingredients: 1 medium ripe pineapple, peeled, cored, cut lengthwise into 8 wedges
1/3 cup natural unsalted pistachios, coarsely chopped
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Stir first 3 ingredients in a large bowl until sugar dissolves. Add pineapple; toss to coat. Let marinate, tossing occasionally, for 10 minutes. Place pineapple, one flat side down, on prepared sheet; reserve marinade. Roast pineapple for 15 minutes. Turn, brush with marinade, and roast until tender and caramelized, 10-15 minutes. Drizzle remaining marinade over; let cool slightly. Divide pineapple among plates. Spoon crème fraîche alongside. Garnish with nuts and mint.
